summary:
This mod add  a underwater domes that player can use own house.  Its location is east sea of Solitude City.
If you want to use it, you must clear little quest and purchase house decoration.
descriptionHtml:
***************************************
Dwemer Aquarium                    ver1.0

				 by Blary
***************************************

I am sorry, but I cannot speak English. Therefore, this sentence uses the machine translation.
I may not understand your words, but please forgive it.

*All dialog and journal use the machine translation and have been omitted. If you want to see all dialog and original one, please read DialogJournal.txt if you can (written in Japanese)

----------------------------
about mod
----------------------------

This mod add  a underwater domes that player can use own house. Its location is east sea of Solitude City.
If you want to use it, you must clear little quest and purchase house decoration.

----------------------------
Installation
----------------------------
1. Extract the downloaded data
2. Copy(or OBMM) the [Data/]folder to Skyrim/ , and check the esp. 

----------------------------
about Quest
----------------------------

1.If you installed this mod and start Skyrim, you can hear rumors about strange visitors at the inn of Solitude(WinkingSkeever\'s owner)
2.Please search strange visitors (near Mzinchaleft).
3.Check him and get diary and enegy cube.
4.Replace it to Aquarium and reboot.
5.purchase house decoration by WinkingSkeever\'s owner(Solitude Inn)

contain hint ScreenShot.

*If you cant activate pillar, please try to use \"QuestSkip(Looks like Shrine of Akatosh)\"at Pillars back.(In control chamber)

----------------------------
Location;
----------------------------

Please see Screen Shot. Mapmarker add your map when you during the quest.
And after purchasing a Bed Room, you can find a spelltome on the desk. If you cast this \"Take Me Home!(Dwemer Aquarium)\"spell ,you can teleport to dome directly.

----------------------------
For several objects....
----------------------------

>>Technical books (Location:Crafting Space)
*There are three Technical Books (Alchemy/Enchant/Smith)in Craftingspace. When you read (activate) books, your skills will improve temporarily.

>>Altar (Location:Bedroom:Bed rightside)
*You can choose your Divine Altar by your self. If you want to change it, please activate night table that is under altar.There are 9 Divines and 1 extra altar.
  Since the default is not there, if you want to use something, please select anything first.

>>Map (Location:Bedroom:Desk)
*You can teleport to all city and joined guilds headquarter, and Dwemer ruins.
　!Caution! You can teleport even if the FT cant use on the progress of some quest. In that case, please donot use Map.

----------------------------
Caution and Note, known Problem
----------------------------

*As for the Map and Return home spell, it can teleport you even if the FT cant use on the progress of some quest. In that case, please donot use Map and Spell.
*Potion/Ingots/Jar/Soulgems in CraftingSpace, there can use like containers.

*If you cant purchase house decoration, please use \"tcll\"in control chamber. and use Lexionstand at left side up.
*I have borrowed some ideas from \"Bravil Sea Domes\"and \"Fishtanks\" (OBLIVION mod by Phitt).

*Dome interiors are not in under water. Its fake. If you use any Mod that change water, There are also likely to be strange.

*All dialog and journal use the machine translation and have been omitted. If you want to see all dialog and original one, please read DialogJournal.txt if you can (written in Japanese)
I want to translation it to English. But I can not do it by my self.

----------------------------
Future Plans
----------------------------

*Same theme Dungeons
*flanked product

----------------------------
usage
----------------------------
meshs and textures are possible to modify and redistribute basically with my credit. 
but I will upload some elements for moddersresource with add and correct.

but esp is not, so I will fix and change in the future.


----------------------------
and...
----------------------------
My other skyrim works:

Pinewoods Cottage:HouseMod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10370
author: Blary
